dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: My colleagues have died.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Three, five? Maybe six.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: The number doesn't matter anymore.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: They were all killed by those wretched new technologies that won't stop springing up.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: One lost their job and starved, one got their flesh taken apart. Others worked like cogs in the machine, treated like subhuman junk.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: They were all diligent chums. I was thankful that they were good to a bloke like me.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: ...'Course, I never showed it.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I was one lucky bugger.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I at least didn't get swept up by rushing waves of technology and die.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I ran off and roamed the Backstreets like a thrown away umbrella until they took me in...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: But I guess I didn't deserve 'em after all.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: In the end, they'd all go away, like wet paper being torn away.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: And the regret and shame I felt as I watched it all happen had my anger boiling.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Maybe, if technology didn't exist as they said...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I could've been laughing and fooling around at a Backstreets pub with chums that could've been alive.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: So I decided to get as serious as I could be and ravage all I can this time for sure.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: They work on science and technology to make life comfortable, but those things end up taking lives. It's why I started thinking that things like those shouldn't have existed in the first place.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Us survivors dug into the rotten remains of a fallen Wing that once stood at the top of technological progress, and put on what they called E.G.O. Products of technology we detested.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: It's ridiculous to think that technology would have a mind, but it seems like this thing does. As soon as I wore this thing, cold and dark feelings rushed into my heart.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: An endless swirl of gloom wrapped around me. But as it did, I got the feeling that maybe this thing was like me.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Maybe, just like I did in the past... this thing once had a friend, but got driven out and abandoned.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Thinking like that... Hah. It gave me motivation to fight.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: It helped me take down all the crooks trying to protect their damned technology and drown it all so they'd never see the light of day again.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: That's not gonna bring my colleagues back from the dead, of course.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: At least I'll reduce the number of people that'll end up like us a fair bit.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: But...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: When I'm done, the chill reminds me that I'm alone.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I go back to wandering damp, dark alleys...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Now I can hardly sleep anywhere else.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Dammit, maybe this E.G.O thing will do me in one day, like how technology doomed all my mates.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: What a farce that'd be.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: ...Whatever. Thinking more won't give me any answers.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Once I'm done with this job, I'll go back with pride...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Once the new world is made... I'll have another chance...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: You leave now. Don't try and give me attention.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I have no friends left now.
